Counter Strike...awww yeeaah! Man i remember me and my pals would head to this pc place, drop down a couple of bucks and play hours of counterstrike. But that was counterstrike 1.6, this is SOURCE. Although I'm pretty late to the party, counter strike source brings back that same addicting gameplay i came to know and love from 1.6. Yes i still suck, but thats not going to stop me from enjoying this game and have a damn good time ^_^
Great game. Old now but still great game. If you like 1st person shooters then you will like this game. 1000s still play this amazing shooter. A must have.

Counter Strike Source is a competitive shooter game, not recommended for casual shooter. Such as Call of Duty and Battlefield.

PRO :
+ Cheap price for addicting gameplay
+ Competitive gameplay
+ Team based game modes
+ Balanced weapons

CONS :
- Difficult to aim, like I said in previous, this is not COD or BF, this game deserved to be competitive game.

7/10

original review:
Counter-Strike: Source.
Buy it.
The game itself is fun. Even if your internet is down, you can still
play with (opinionally difficult) AI, on any map you've downloaded.
But the mods for the game are what really give it replay value.
There are MANY types: deathrun, mini-game, gun-game, jail break, et cetera.
There are always thousands of people on this game at all times,
even in the mornings (I have stood up late playing this).
Also, if you get bored with the gun/player/prop appearances,
you can get skins for anything (the skinning base is large).
Overall, a great game. Get it, you will enjoy hundreds (atleast) of hours out of it.
TERRORIST WIN. TERROIST WIN. COUNTER-TERROIST WIN.
Because aiming at peoples feet to get headshots is extremely realistic with guns more balanced than Halo.

It is still my favorite of the CS series and one of the games that I spend most of my time on (although, admittedly, not as much as my marathon sessions that I used to pull as a kid). I prefer this one to 1.6 for two reasons - shooting the head is actually shooting the head, and updated graphics.

Updated as of 2015: I have now had the opportunity to continue the aforementioned sessions and this is still the shooter I fall back to. The skill of the players on Source, and the style of gameplay is, Imo unmatched anywhere else. I've been trying to get into GO but this game calls to me.

Updated as of 2016: GO has started to catch up with this game. It's still good, but you can find excellent matches on GO now and the dedication that the community has towards the game (GO) is awesome. So I don't play this much now.

[h1]8/10[/h1]
Ремейк первой кс на новом движке. 
Весьма неплохая стрельба и атмосфера.

Es un juego multijugador que después de que hayan sacado el MW3 y el Battlefield3 la gente sigue enganchandose a la saga, deseando tener la beta del nuevo y poder seguir echandose unos tiros asi de a gusto, mucho vicio =)

What can be said about Counter Strike that hasn't already been covered in the many reviews over the years?  This is an unforgiving, tacticle shooter that has thrilled many players since the first iteration back in 1999.  This version sports better graphics, mild physics, and slightly different weapons mechanics, but over-all it is still the same game people know and love.  If you haven't played it yet, give it a try.  This game will give you hours of fun.
Only buy this game if you want the textures for Gmod, otherwise it's worthless. Wanna know the kill;death ratio? 3/80. For a pro.

Hard game needs time to learn to paly. but once your erady, this is a great game and i sometimes laught my face off at how i die or shot out at my screan when die so stupidly. this game is limitless replay wise and there is always somebody who will be better than you which gives you a great challenge so your never bored.. 
if you own garry's mod this game is the best one to have for your source engine

Counter Strike é a origem dos FPS atuais, este jogo lançado em 2006 continua sendo um dos mais jogados e vendidos até hoje da steam. Não exige uma super configuração de hardware, é um jogo simples e divertido. É possível elevar a sua habilidade ao extremo, existem muitas pessoas realmente boas nesse jogo, isso pode incomodar os iniciantes, mas nada que a prática não resolva. É lotado de servidor brasileiro, onde o pessoal conversa bastante pelo microfone, na maioria das vezes é uma farra só, isto acaba se tornando muito divertido. É um jogo que vale a pena comprar, pois mesmo por terem lançado outros jogos mais complexos e superproduzidos, você sempre vai querer dar uma jogadinha de vez enquando, pois a simplicidade deste jogo é genial.

This game is inherently broken but still so much fun, so play it with people who enjoy not feeling so competitive all the time. Unless you think quicksniping is somehow an elite skill. Then I'd just pity you.
Сетевой шутер всех времен и народов. На мой взгляд лучшая версия из имеющихся (грядущий кс:го не в счет). Здесь и приятная графика, и живой и динамичный геймплей.
It's basically 1.6 with the Source engine.  Easier gameplay expected.
